metadata.title: Week 1 Day 2: Introduction to Latin Nouns

prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of the Latin alphabet and pronunciation. They should be familiar with the concept of nouns and their role in sentences from English grammar. This includes recognizing nouns as people, places, things, or ideas. Additionally, students should have been introduced to the idea of grammatical gender, though not yet in the context of Latin.
yesterday_recap: Yesterday, we introduced the Latin alphabet and practiced pronunciation. We also discussed the concept of grammatical gender in Latin.
misconception_watchlist: Confusing Latin noun endings with English

primary: Understand the concept of grammatical gender in Latin

lesson_flow.description: Review the Latin alphabet and pronunciation from yesterday.
lesson_flow.student_action: Students recite the alphabet and practice pronunciation.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Ensure correct pronunciation and address any difficulties.

lesson_flow.description: Introduce Latin nouns and the concept of grammatical gender.
lesson_flow.student_action: Listen and take notes on the introduction to Latin nouns.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Use examples to illustrate the concept of gender in Latin nouns.

lesson_flow.description: Practice identifying Latin nouns and their genders with examples.
lesson_flow.student_action: Work through examples with the teacher, identifying nouns and their genders.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Provide immediate feedback and correct misconceptions.

lesson_flow.description: Students complete a worksheet identifying nouns and their genders.
lesson_flow.student_action: Independently identify nouns and their genders on the worksheet.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Circulate to provide support and check for understanding.

lesson_flow.description: Recap the day's learning and preview the next lesson.
lesson_flow.student_action: Participate in a brief discussion about what was learned.
lesson_flow.teacher_notes: Highlight key points and address any remaining questions.

behavior.loop_behavior: Provide positive reinforcement and gentle correction
